verdict.summary: System out of memory. Node process or system-wide memory exhaustion.

dead_ends.why_fails: If system RAM is exhausted, increasing V8 heap won't help
Swap is extremely slow â€” fix the memory usage instead

workarounds.action: Profile memory usage to find leaks: node --inspect + Chrome DevTools
Process data in streams instead of loading everything into memory
Check for common leaks: growing arrays, unclosed connections, event listener accumulation
workarounds.how: growing arrays, unclosed connections, event listener accumulation

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' is a system_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
